doc.field: we shouldn't accept the only solutions because we all would agree on climate change, we all want cleaner air and water. we shouldn't accept the argument the only way of getting those things is with less sovereignty, more bureaucracy, more intervention, more regulation, more global power. the real solutions to those things are property rights, you know, extend property rights to things like air an water, give people ownership and they will make things cleaner. the great adam smith once said if you give a man a sevenyear lease on a garden he will turn
